section.heading: Presumption created by publication.
section.text: The publication of any document in the District of Columbia Statutes-at-Large, the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations, or the District of Columbia Register creates a rebuttable presumption:

para.text: That it was duly issued, prescribed, adopted, or enacted; and
That all requirements of this subchapter have been complied with.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 6, 1979, D.C. Law 2-153, § 4, 25 DCR 6960
